name: Through the Dead City
description:
Through the Dead City is an open-world zombie survival game. You must scavenge for weapons, supplies and find other survivors to join you as you fight your way through a procedurally generated city.

Current status:

The project is on hold indefinitely. Unfortunately I didn't have time for large personal projects for a couple years and now the framework (XNA) is outdated. I feel that if I ever do continue development on Through the Dead City, I would start over in Unity and make multiplayer a higher priority. But at the moment there are no plans to continue unless there is a large demand to see it completed.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D: Move
  • Left Click: Shoot!
  • Right Click: Melee attack
  • E: Interact with objects in range of one of your squad members (doors, boxes, cabinets, etc.)
  • Spacebar: Enter/Exit tactical mode. Here you can click your squad members, then click the shield above their heads and point out where you would like them to defend
  • Q: Quick regroup. (squad will return to formation)
  • Z: Go solo. (this will set all your squad members to defend the current location while you can move freely
  • T: Squad Formation window. Click and drag survivors in the window to set their default formation
  • I: Inventory. Each squad member has their own inventory but there are 5 slots in the middle shared between them (Useful for sharing ammo)
    • Right click: Equip weapon or use healing items (must be in the inventory of the member you're trying to equip/heal)
    • Ctrl + Left Click and Drag: Split a stack of items in half
